name: Issues
body:
# BugHub - Issues
### GitHub issues on your iPad

BugHub is a comercial iPad application. This repository is used for filing issues against the app. 
The main application website is at [bughubapp.com](http://bughubapp.com) and is available on the [App Store](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bughub/id505065500?ls=1&mt=8)

Manage your issues on GitHub with style! BugHub is a full featured issue tracking client that works with GitHub on your iPad.
Some features:

* Manage multiple repositories
* Create new issues
* Comment on issues
* Assign issues to team members
* Add and remove labels
* Set milestones
* Close and reopen issues

BugHub bugs can be filed at the Me1000/issues repository
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
